section.p: At the centre of the island stands a fortress with featureless grey walls and a single gate. The drawbridge is down and the portcullis raised, but on the other side stands a massive golem with thews of adamantine rock.
‘You must give the password,’ booms the golem.
The boxes above are used to record how many times you have got this far. Tick one now.
